text: SOUTHEASTERN BAPTIST THEOLOGICAL SEMINARY EXISTS TO GLORIFY THE LORD JESUS CHRIST BY EQUIPPING STUDENTS TO SERVE THE CHURCH AND FULFILL THE GREAT COMMISSION.
Meet the Dean of Graduate Studies
Meet the Dean of Doctoral Studies
4 YEARS, 4 STRATEGIC INITIATIVES, FOR THE GLORY OF GOD
Every classroom is a Great Commission classroom.
We seek to glorify the Lord Jesus Christ by equipping students to serve the Church and fulfill the Great Commission.
We offer a wide range of degrees to equip you as you fulfill the Great Commission.
Know exactly what you'll be paying as you prepare to come to seminary. Our goal is to help you make the wisest possible decision financially.
Wake Forest is a small town near a big city. With easy access to museums, great restaurants and more, moving to seminary has never been easier.
We do not primarily ask, “Why should I go carry the Gospel to the nations?” Rather, we ask, “Why should I stay in my homeland when there are so many who have not heard?”

"Because He came, we go." - Dr. Danny Akin
"Our job is to tell others about Jesus, whether or not our names are recorded in the story." - Dr. Chuck Lawless
Southeastern Baptist Theological Seminary seeks to glorify the Lord Jesus Christ by equipping students to serve the Church and fulfill the Great Commission.
